info.title: Project ReadMe document manager.
info.description: Manages a project's read me document in the form of a web document. Table of contents is not included in this document.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Initialize the read me web document.

parameter.name: $projectRootDirectory
parameter.description: The project's root directory. This can vary from repository to published library.

parameter.name: $rootRelative
parameter.description: Indicates whether the path is system root relative or absolute.

method.name: update

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale of the document context. If empty, it will be the current locale of the user. It is NULL by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getRootDirectory
method.description: Get the project's root directory to store the read me file.
